## Opportunities

We are always eager to work with committed researchers who are passionate about advancing interdisciplinary research in catalysis and energy.


###  Graduate Students: 
We have a few openings available for highly qualified and motivated candidates with a strong interest in interdisciplinary chemistry and materials research to join our team. 

### Undergraduate Students: 
We welcome motivated undergraduate students to get involved in our research projects. 

### Visiting Ph.D. Students and Scholars: 
We are open to hosting motivated visiting Ph.D. students and scholars from around the world. To apply, please provide the following documents for consideration: 

- CV
- Research plan
- Language proficiency certificate (if applicable)
- One reference letter (if available)
